rules.ruleString: Unit was previously coded {EC384, EC3844, EC3845E, ECC3840%, ECO3840, ECO3844}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ECC2000} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}

description: The unit will cover, in mathematical terms, many of the areas treated more intuitively in first-year microeconomics, eg: consumer demand, the theory of the firm, equilibrium and Pareto optimum. However, a significant portion of the lectures will deal with topics not covered earlier, such as non-linear programming, game theory, and dynamic optimisation.
